content: crochet charms are the best to add a personal touch to you belongings they are great to adorn many crochet projects crochet charms are often quick and easy projects and are quite fun to make if you are looking out for a spooky halloween pattern this skull charm may be just what you need this is a two round pattern made with the basic crochet stitches this is a beginner friendly pattern you can use them as appliques and embellishments for you crochet projects or add a hanging loop and use them as charms and gift toppers materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 2 5 inches crochet terms used - us crochet terms checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/gmwc81fl2cm
